summary: A boy declares his love for his girlfriend, only to die the same night. He is brought back to life by his mother as a flesh-craving zombie, who sires more teen undead while trying to control his, er, appetite for his beloved.
cast: Samantha Mumba|David Leon|Tadhg Murphy|Laurence Kinlan|Sara James|Mark Huberman|Sarah Burke|Paul Reid|Jane Valentine|Conor Ryan|Deirdre O'Kane|Doreen Keogh|Bryan Murray|Denis Conway|Lalor Roddy|Gary Lydon|Domhnall Gleeson|Elaine Murphy|Keith Burke|Florrie McDonald|Susan Allen|Ian Lockhart|Lewis Doyle|Hong Lu|Ellen Therese Fleming|Shane McCormack|Tim Gahan|Oisin Murphy|Michelle Girgis Burke|Ian O'Shea|Paul Huberman|Katie O'Shea|Joanne King|Finn Purcell Milton|Katie Kirby|Ann Rutledge|Holly White
title: Boy Eats Girl
